backend/main.mo: Main backend actor implementing access control, user profiles, service categories, bookings with optional name, reviews, and loyalty tracking.
backend/migration.mo: Migration module converting old bookings to new format by adding the optional name field.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping new customer-name-related features to the affected frontend files and components.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries of all major frontend files including chat, hooks, screens, and layout components.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind-based styles defining color variables, dark mode tokens, and base element styling.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point loading the root React app via main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Defines TanStack Router routes and wraps the app with ThemeProvider and Toaster.
frontend/src/chat/bookingStateMachine.ts: Chat state machine handling intents, entity extraction, and booking flow including optional customer name.
frontend/src/chat/entityExtraction.ts: Rule-based extraction of service-related entities and confidence scoring from user text.
frontend/src/chat/intentDetection.ts: Detects user intent and language using keyword-based scoring across English, Hindi, and Hinglish.
frontend/src/chat/types.ts: Defines chat message types, conversation steps, intents, and booking draft structure.
frontend/src/chat/validators.ts: Validates addresses, contact info, time windows, and booking IDs with simple rules.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: Renders a login/logout button using Internet Identity with loading and error handling.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProfileSetu: Modal prompting new authenticated users to enter basic profile info and save it.
frontend/src/components/chat/ChatTranscr: Displays chat messages with auto-scrolling and timestamp formatting.
frontend/src/components/chat/QuickReplie: Shows selectable quick reply buttons for chat interactions.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppHeader: Top navigation bar with branding, navigation links, and login button.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppLayout: Main layout wrapper with header, footer, routed content, and profile setup modal.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages an authenticated or anonymous backend actor and refreshes dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useAdminBookings.ts: Fetches admin booking data and customer profiles, currently returning empty arrays until backend support is added.
frontend/src/hooks/useBookingDetails.ts: Retrieves detailed booking information by ID using the backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useBookingReview.ts: Fetches a review for a booking and provides a mutation for submitting reviews, with backend methods not yet implemented.
frontend/src/hooks/useCancelBooking.ts: Provides a mutation to cancel a booking and refresh related queries.
frontend/src/hooks/useCompleteBooking.ts: Provides a mutation for marking bookings as completed, currently stubbed pending backend support.
frontend/src/hooks/useCreateBooking.ts: Creates new bookings using backend API and refreshes the user's bookings list.
frontend/src/hooks/useCurrentUserProfile: Loads the currently authenticated user's profile via the backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Manages Internet Identity authentication, providing identity state, login, and logout functionality.
frontend/src/hooks/useIsAdmin.ts: Determines whether the authenticated caller is an admin using backend validation.
frontend/src/hooks/useMyBookings.ts: Fetches bookings belonging to the authenticated user.
Provides a mutation to reschedule an existing booking and invalidate related queries.
frontend/src/hooks/useSaveCurrentUserPro: Saves the authenticated user's profile and refreshes it afterward.
Loads service categories from the backend and caches them for five minutes.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base styles and theme variables for light and dark modes plus chat bubble components.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Initializes the React app with query and identity providers and mounts it to the DOM.
frontend/src/screens/AdminDashboardScree: Admin dashboard gatekeeping UI that checks authentication, admin status, loads bookings, and allows completing bookings.
frontend/src/screens/BookingDetailsScree: Displays details for a single booking with options to cancel or review, handling loading, errors, and identity checks.
frontend/src/screens/ChatBookingScreen.t: Chat-driven booking interface managing conversation state, booking actions, and service categories with persistence.
frontend/src/screens/MyBookingsScreen.ts: Shows a user's bookings with authentication checks, error states, and navigation to booking details.
frontend/src/utils/chatPersistence.ts: Saves, loads, migrates, and clears persisted chat conversation state with versioning and expiration.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Helpers for reading, storing, and clearing URL and session parameters, including hash-routing support.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration defining content sources, theme extensions for colors, fonts, animations, and enabling typography, container queries, and animation plugins.
project_state.json: Project state description detailing current chatbot features, architectural constraints, and requirements for an expanded web dashboard and multilingual, rule-based system.
